reasoning_log: The matching process prioritized unique architectural features and room functions. Desc_1 (Living/Dining), Desc_4 (Garage), Desc_6 (Master Bedroom), Desc_7 (Dry/Wet Bathroom), Desc_9 (Open Shower Bathroom), and Desc_10 (Room with Balcony Door) were matched with high confidence to Images 1, 4, 6, 7, 9, and 10 respectively, as these images contained distinct, non-replicable elements. The kitchen descriptions required careful differentiation: Desc_13 was uniquely matched to Image 13 due to the visible staircase. Desc_3 was matched to Image 3 as it provides the wide, open-plan view encompassing both the dining area and the island. Images 2 and 5, being nearly identical views of the L-shaped kitchen with an island, were assigned to Desc_2 and Desc_5 sequentially. The three remaining empty secondary rooms (Images 8, 11, 12) are visually indistinguishable and were assigned sequentially to Desc_8, Desc_11, and Desc_12 to ensure a complete 1:1 mapping.

matching_result_list.evidence: Image shows a combined living area (sofa, TV wall) and dining area (table for 4) with large windows, matching the '客廳餐廳一體空間' tag.
L-shaped kitchen with white cabinets, stove, sink, and a prominent black granite island/bar counter ('用餐中島吧檯'). Assigned as the primary kitchen view.
Wide view showing the integration of the dining table and the kitchen island, confirming the '開放式餐廳與中島區' and '開放格局' tags.
Semi-enclosed, covered outdoor space with a roll-up door and durable flooring, clearly functioning as a '騎樓／車庫'.
Identical kitchen layout to Image 2, showing the 'L型廚房格局' and the door on the left, supporting the '近後陽台出入口' tag.
The only furnished bedroom, featuring a large bed, bedside tables, and large windows, matching '主臥房' and '空間寬敞'.
Bathroom featuring a glass partition separating the shower area from the toilet/vanity, confirming '乾濕分離設計'.
Unfurnished, square room with a window, matching '次臥房一(空房)'. Assigned sequentially among the similar empty rooms.
Bathroom where the shower area is open (no glass door or curtain), matching '衛浴二(無拉門)' and '無明顯乾濕分離'.
Empty room featuring a large sliding glass door leading outside, confirming '空房(帶陽台門)' and '可能連接陽台'.
Unfurnished, square room, matching '次臥房二'. Assigned sequentially among the similar empty rooms.
Unfurnished, square room, matching '次臥房三'. Assigned sequentially among the similar empty rooms.
L-shaped kitchen view that clearly shows a staircase ('與樓梯相鄰') on the left side.
